Entertaining the human race is more than our mission at MGM Resorts, 
it’s the north star that illuminates new possibilities ahead. 
In 2022, we achieved several important milestones: welcoming
The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas into our family, saying a heartfelt
goodbye to The Mirage, ensuring our continued service in Macau for 
the next decade and so much more. Together, we’re excited to continue 
delivering extraordinary new experiences that wow our customers 
from around the world and position us for a growing future.
